utils.point2inch¶

utils.point2inch(*tupl)¶

Converts cm to inch (mostly used for figsize)

Parameters:
tuplfloat or tuple

values to convert

Returns:
restuple

size in inch

Notes

Second example contains the figure sizes in points recommended by ACS Publications: width of single column figure: 240 pt, min width of double column fig: 300 pt, max width of double column fig: 504 pt, max height including the caption: 660 pt, minimum font size: 4.5 pt

Examples

>>> point2inch(72)
(1.0,)
>>> point2inch(240, 300, 504, 660)
(3.3333333333333335, 4.166666666666667, 7.0, 9.166666666666666)

MCBJ STM-BJ
